directions: Combine cottage cheese and ranch mix in a bowl. Add spinach, artichoke hearts, and almonds. Mix well.
Serve chilled with assorted vegetables such as carrot and celery sticks.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package non-dairy ranch dip mix
1 (13.5 ounce) can chopped spinach, well drained
title: Spinach Artichoke Lactaid® Dip
